definitions: Given an order for or authorized the production of (something, especially a piece of artwork, music, or writing).
Appointed (someone) to the rank of officer in the armed services.
Authorized (a person or organization) to perform a particular task or function.
Put (a machine, an army, etc.) into active service.
examples: The artist was commissioned to paint a portrait.
He was commissioned as a second lieutenant.
The firm was commissioned to conduct the survey.
The new warship was commissioned last month.
